targets.expr: sum (kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", deployment="$helm_release_name"}) without (instance, pod, job, endpoint, service, container)
sum (kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", deployment="$helm_release_name"}) without (instance, pod, job, endpoint, service, container)
sum (kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", deployment="$helm_release_name-redis-master"}) without (instance, pod, job, endpoint, service, container)
sum (kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", deployment="$helm_release_name-redis-master"}) without (instance, pod, job, endpoint, service, container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$bridge_pod_name_regex",container!="POD",pod!="", container!=""}) / max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$bridge_pod_name_regex", resource="memory", unit="byte", container!="POD",pod!="", container!=""})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$redis_pod_name_regex",container!="POD",pod!="", container!=""}) / max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$redis_pod_name_regex", resource="memory", unit="byte", container!="POD",pod!="", container!=""})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"op-scim-bride-redis-master-.*",container!="POD",pod!="", container!=""}) / max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"op-scim-bride-redis-master-.*", resource="memory", unit="byte", container!="POD",pod!="", container!=""})
